artist: Artist: David Singer; Printer: Tea Lautrec Litho, San Francisco
description: black and gray image of soldiers on horseback, riding through desert landscape; pair of crossed legs in fishnet stockings, rising out of horizon, appear to be holding up buffalo nickle; black border with gray text on top and bottom

title: Janis Joplin and Her Band, Savoy Brown, Aum, Winterland, March 20-22, 1969, Fillmore West, March 23, 1969
